abstract: The Justice Department said late Friday that a proposed legal settlement between Google and book authors and publishers should not be approved by the court without modifications.
snippet: The Justice Department said late Friday that a proposed legal settlement between Google and book authors and publishers should not be approved by the court without modifications.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  In the latest challenge to Google’s plan to establish the world’s largest digital library and bookstore, the Justice Department said late Friday that a proposed legal settlement between Google and book authors and publishers should not be approved by the court without modifications.

headline.main: Government Urges Changes to Google Books Deal
headline.print_headline: U.S. Urges Changes to Google’s Book Project Deal
